job_tasks.phrase: Modellen die voorspellen welke advertentie banner/creative het meest geschikt is voor een online bezoeker
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the core task of developing predictive models for a specific business problem (ad suitability).

job_tasks.phrase: Predictieve modellen voor most likely converters/clickers van advertentie campagnes
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly mentions 'predictive models' for identifying likely converters/clickers, a classic ML task.

job_tasks.phrase: Predictieve modellen voor het voorspellen van leeftijd en gender van DPG Media online bezoekers obv geconsumeerde content
job_tasks.justification: Another clear instance of developing predictive models based on user content consumption.

job_tasks.phrase: Toevoegen van profile enrichments in batch & real-time flows in een big data environment
job_tasks.justification: This refers to data processing and integration within a big data environment, fitting the data engineering aspect.

job_tasks.phrase: Data pipelines & dashboards voor quality monitoring & alerting
job_tasks.justification: This describes the creation and maintenance of data pipelines and monitoring systems, which falls under data engineering and operational aspects.

job_tasks.phrase: Je bouwt en onderhoudt ook data pipelines & werkt mee aan onze web applicaties.
job_tasks.justification: This indicates involvement in building and maintaining data pipelines and web applications, which are core software engineering tasks.

job_tasks.phrase: You build it, you run it mentaliteit (development & devops, infra-as-code, CICD, ...)
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly mentions DevOps practices like infra-as-code and CI/CD, which are key to MLOps.

job_tasks.phrase: Je bouwt samen met de Data & ML engineers ons ML Ops platform uit
job_tasks.justification: This directly refers to building an ML Ops platform, a core MLOps task.

job_tasks.phrase: Je integreert onze services met andere DPG teams die van onze data services gebruik maken
job_tasks.justification: This describes the integration of services with other teams, a typical software integration task.

job_tasks.phrase: Indien gewenst, bouw je mee aan onze web-applicaties (voor interne & externe gebruikers) die onze data-producten ontsluiten
job_tasks.justification: This indicates contributing to web applications that expose data products, a software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: Je analyseert requirements, experimenteert met verschillende modellen, onderbouwt je keuzes adhv quality parameters, implementeert & presenteert resultaten naar het dev & business team
job_tasks.justification: This covers the entire lifecycle of model development: analysis, experimentation, implementation, and presentation of results.

job_tasks.phrase: Je bouwt mee aan onze onderliggende data stack & data pipelines (python, PySpark, ElasticSearch, Terraform, Airflow,..)
job_tasks.justification: This describes building data stacks and pipelines using specific tools, fitting the data engineering category.

job_tasks.phrase: presenteert resultaten naar het dev & business team
job_tasks.justification: Presenting results to business teams indicates an understanding of business needs and communication of technical outcomes.
Analyzing requirements implies understanding business needs to translate them into technical tasks.

job_tasks.phrase: Je neemt ownership & accountability voor bepaalde modellen, jobs & applicaties
job_tasks.justification: Taking ownership and accountability directly maps to the 'Ownership' aspect of this category.

job_tasks.phrase: Je versterkt ons scrum team bestaande uit Product Owner, Scrum Master & 8 developers.
job_tasks.justification: Working within a scrum team implies collaboration and communication.

job_tasks.phrase: Je neemt deel aan standups, refinements, retro's & demo's (2-week)
job_tasks.justification: Participation in scrum ceremonies is a direct indicator of collaboration and communication.

job_tasks.phrase: presenteert resultaten naar het dev & business team
job_tasks.justification: Presenting results to both technical (dev) and non-technical (business) teams highlights communication skills.
Coaching other engineers demonstrates communication and knowledge sharing skills.

soft_skills.phrase: Je versterkt ons scrum team bestaande uit Product Owner, Scrum Master & 8 developers.
soft_skills.justification: Working within a scrum team implies collaboration and communication.

soft_skills.phrase: Je neemt deel aan standups, refinements, retro's & demo's (2-week)
soft_skills.justification: Participation in scrum ceremonies is a direct indicator of collaboration and communication.

soft_skills.justification: Presenting results to both technical (dev) and non-technical (business) teams highlights communication skills.

profile.rationale: The job ad focuses heavily on traditional ML tasks such as building predictive models for advertising, analyzing user behavior, and implementing these models. While it mentions working with data pipelines, MLOps, and web applications (Macro-Category A tasks), the core responsibilities (Macro-Category B) are centered around traditional ML, not Generative AI. There is no mention of LLMs, RAG, or other GenAI-specific technologies or tasks. Therefore, the role is classified as a Core ML Engineer.

confidence.reasoning: The job advertisement is very clear and detailed regarding the specific types of models to be built (predictive models for advertising, user behavior) and the technologies involved (Python, PySpark, Airflow). The distinction between traditional ML and GenAI is clear, and the tasks described align perfectly with the definition of a Core ML Engineer. There is no ambiguity.
